Title: Swordmasters

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline if general is ELDRITCH COUNCIL

Intro: Each model in a Swordmasters unit is armed with a Greatsword.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Bladelord. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that modelâ€™s Greatsword.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. You can add 1 to charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: A Blur Of Blades
Rules.Rule: ABILITIESA Blur of Blades: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made by this unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound roll and save roll for each hit.
